mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(t.id,70000) as game_type, IFNULL(t.game_name,'OG视讯') game_name, COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.betting_amount) betamount, SUM(d.win_lose_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_amount) validamount FROM ds_og_live d LEFT JOIN ds_game_type t ON d.game_name_id = t.out_game_code AND t.fk_live_id=3 and t.parent_id = 70
GROUP BY d.game_name_id
select count(*) as bet_count,sum(betting_amount) as betamount,sum(valid_amount) as validamount,sum(win_lose_amount) as winlose from ds_og_live
mapper.sql: id, site_id, product_id, username, play_name, betting_amount, valid_amount, win_lose_amount, win_lose_type, game_record_id, order_number, table_id, stage, inning, game_name_id, game_betting_kind, game_betting_content, result_type, compensate_rate, balance, add_time, platform_id, vendor_id, game_result, create_time, update_time, memo
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ds_og_live
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ds_og_live (site_id, product_id, username, play_name, betting_amount, valid_amount, win_lose_amount, win_lose_type, game_record_id, order_number, table_id, stage, inning, game_name_id, game_betting_kind, game_betting_content, result_type, compensate_rate, balance, add_time, platform_id, vendor_id, game_result, create_time, update_time, memo) values (#{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bettingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{validAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{winLoseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{winLoseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gameRecordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inning,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameNameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameBettingKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gameBettingContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compensateRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gameResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time, count(1) bet_count, SUM(d.betting_amount) betamount,SUM(d.win_lose_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_amount) validamount FROM ds_og_live d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
